name: Secret Agent Spy Mission Games
description:
This game is all about a secret spy who is in a five star hotel with high profile targets to execute on high priority. Live life of secret spy who operates under the radar, Trained as sniper shooter in for stealth games in assassination mission, exhibit quickly & sneak stealth moves. Infiltrate hotel building use your secret agent spy skills to reach the final destination. Utilize your Sniper gun shooting experience for stealth attack the hotel security guards. Aim and shoot in one of the best first person shooting special agent game. It’s a free game to test your stealth killing abilities. Take down hotel security guards & crack the high security area using your night vision carefully survive the agent survival game. Sneak behind enemy security guards, pick locks in this game. Being a professional special agent spy get ready to execute dangerous high profile target operation.

Secret agency has hired as secret agent for this high profile assassinations mission that involves stealth shooting, dodging security guards, reach the high profile target room and do not get killed or caught in this special force game.



Features
5 action packed missions
Realistic Grand hotel environment
Highly challenging games play for real spy
Real time sniper shooting & long range guns
A.I based VIP guest security guard’s
Download this game, live life of spy agent and do give us reviews about our game.
